text: Before Myka turned 1, she hit upwards of $500,000 in medical costs because of a congenital heart defect. If Republicans confirm Trump’s Supreme Court nominee, insurance companies could deny her the coverage she needs to survive. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkJhHKMXYAAi8_b.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1315719634415497220/vid/320x320/bG16hX8fQ3Alri1C.mp4?tag=13

Glad the @DHSOIG has accepted my call to investigate these horrifying allegations of human rights abuses. That investigation should include interviews with all involved in a culturally appropriate manner—in-person & with translation services, if necessary. https://twitter.com/SenBooker/status/1305983244618346496 QT @SenBooker The whistleblower complaint detailing heinous abuses to immigrant detainees under ICE custody—including subjecting female detainees to hysterectomies at alarming rates, medical neglect & more—must be investigated. I’ve written to @DHSOIG to find answers. https://www.booker.senate.gov/news/press/sen-booker-demands-ig-investigation-into-horrific-mistreatment-of-immigrant-detainees-alleged-by-whistleblower

Trump's lies never stop.  While he continues to talk about how the pandemic in the U.S. is receding there were more than 68,000 new COVID cases on Friday — the highest one-day total since July. We need a president who believes in science, not right-wing mythology.

Black Americans are dying from COVID-19 at 2x the rate of white Americans. 

This pandemic has further reinforced historical inequities in our nation—and it is clear that confronting these disparities is not a priority for this administration.

RT @JoeBiden In the middle of a pandemic, President Trump is trying to eliminate Obamacare and increase health care costs for millions.

Now, he’s rushing through a U.S. Supreme Court justice to help him get it done. It’s unconscionable. 

Make no mistake: Health care is on the ballot.
